(Ok, I truly don't mean to make these seem like I want my way, hell, 
I've nailed the bridge on several occassions already, I've already 
done the damage I wished.  But...this is a matter of confusion.  
First of Jason, how do you fly into the bridge, take the charge, and 
get out of the base in under 5 seconds?  That's just confusing.

Seconds, Minime, had a better chance, but he carried Spears into the 
Ark (of course, this could be as the bomb was being set, I'm not 
sure), set her outside of the room in about a second.  I'm sorry, at 
the least that would be 3 seconds or so.  Unless the character that 
was helping her was the Flash.  But I don't care, if you wanna keep 
it this way, it's all the same to me, I'm not going to argue this 
early in the morning for something as unimportant as that.  Of 
course, Minime, before you picked up Spears, you must've missed the 
post where I believe...Jhogan (Xiane) picked her up and carried her 
into the Ark, which was before yours.  So your post is void, unless 
you still want to do whatever the hell you did.  By the way, this 
isn't my last problem out one of Icedemon's transgressions.  So Ice, 
there's another one.  And YOU are pushing ME to the edge.  At a nice 
speedy pace)
